summary: This is a certification of business records from FedEx Express, signed by Tracey L. Ferrara as Custodian of Records, verifying that certain documents are original or true copies made and kept in the regular course of business. It is a procedural document used to authenticate records for legal purposes, likely related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Tracey L. Ferrara
persons.role: Custodian of Records for FedEx Express Legal Department
persons.context: She is the employee who certifies the authenticity of FedEx business records for legal purposes.

persons.name: A. W.
persons.context: A notary public who witnessed the signing and swearing of the certification document.

events.title: Execution of FedEx Business Records Certification
events.description: Tracey L. Ferrara signs and swears to the certification of FedEx business records before a notary public.

locations: FedEx Express Legal Department, 3620 Hacks Cross Road, Building B, Third Floor, Memphis, TN 38125
keyFacts: Tracey L. Ferrara, as Custodian of Records for FedEx Express, certified that certain documents are original or true copies made in the regular course of business.
The certification was executed on February 21, 2008, at the FedEx Legal Department in Memphis, Tennessee.
The document is a procedural authentication of business records, likely submitted as evidence in legal proceedings related to the Epstein case.
